mapper.select: select t.*,group_concat(a.leader) as leader,group_concat(a.emailAcc SEPARATOR ';') as email,u.id as userid,u.loginacc from t_type t left join t_agency a on find_in_set(a.id,t.agentyId) LEFT JOIN t_user u on t.userId=u.id where t.userId=#{userId} group by t.id limit #{pageQuery.pageNo},#{pageQuery.pageSize}
select t.*,u.id as userId,u.loginAcc,(select group_concat(leader) from t_agency where id in(#{agencyId})) as leader from t_type t,t_user u where t.userId=u.id
mapper.insert: insert into t_type (typename, userId, agentyId,createTime) values ( #{typename}, #{userId}, #{agentyId},#{createTime})
mapper.update: update t_type set typename=#{typename},agentyId=#{agentyId} where id = #{id}
